title: Open Ladder Trials New Split New Dreams.
body:
Hello,  Ex OCS players looking to form a new team for Season 7 2017, Currently recruiting/trialing the roles TOP/ AND MID if you main these roles and are interested in joining please follow instructions below.

Application Required to join:

Add Skidlife3 Ingame Client (Oceanic)
Username in League of Legends:
Age:
Current Rank Must be D3 Soloque or greater in season 6.
Can you use Voice coms?
Previous Experience in League of Legends?:
Current Competitive status in League of Legends?:
Short Bio:

Requirements:
• Working Microphone.
• Mature.
• Over 17 years old.
• Can handle criticism.
• Non Salty / Toxic Minimal Flamer.
• Friendly / Good Personality.

replies.body: Still recruiting for season 7 open ladder split
Quick update the bot lane finalized and jungle roles filled. Currently recruiting **Midlaner** and a **Toplaner**
that's me be be quiet idiot
thanks for everyone who  viewed trials still open if you're interested add ingame thanks.
Any questions you can contact me @ingame just add Skidlife 2 Or Skidlife 3
